snippet.title: Sky Knights - Steam Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
Vote for Sky Knights on Steam Greenlight. http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=803524713

Apply for the public alpha today: http://www.skyknights-game.com

Sky Knights is a top-down 4 vs 4 online action game for PC, in which you take on the role as a modern fighter pilot. You fly with and fight against other players online in a struggle to win each battle. The game is easy to learn and offers a quick action-packed experience, but at the same time stays true to many fundamentals of realistic aerial combat.

Trailer edited by Roland Smedberg @ www.epicbubble.com
